settings.title: OUR MISSION
settings.text:
Our mission at BIO RAW is to transform lives, the planet, and the food industry one meal at a time. All of our meals are carefully crafted by our in-house nutritionists to provide exceptional nutritional value. 

BIO RAW makes it easy for you to enjoy fresh and delicious, plant-based meals with home + office delivery across the Greater Toronto Area. 

You can also find our offerings in grocery stores across Ontario.

settings.title: 1. YOU CHOOSE YOUR MEAL PREFERENCE
settings.text: From our award winning meal options

settings.title: 2. WE DELIVER TO YOUR DOORSTEP - FOR FREE
settings.text: Fresh organic, plant-based, ready-to-eat meals

settings.title: 3. YOU EAT NUTRITIOUS MEALS EVERY DAY
settings.text: Helping you feel at your best, whatever the goal

settings.title: EMPOWERING PEOPLE TO EAT MORE PLANTS
settings.subheading: Our mission is to educate and empower our customers towards healthier eating choices so they can live life to the fullest without compromise!

settings.title: OUR PROMISE
settings.text_1: We choose local whenever possible and we always use plant-based, whole foods ingredients from trusted suppliers and organic farms that use sustainable agriculture practices. All of our meals are USDA Certified Organic.
settings.text_2: All of our meals are carefully crafted by our in-house nutritionists, to provide you with exceptional nutritional value. This includes the perfect blend of plant-based proteins, fiber, and phytonutrients to fuel, nourish, and satiate you.
settings.text_3: BIO RAW doesn’t just give you delicious meals—we give you your time back. By removing meal planning, grocery shopping, and prep from your routine, you’ll free up hours each week and enjoy meals far tastier and healthier than boring ol’ takeout.

settings.title: WE SUPPORT LOCAL
settings.text:
Social responsibility is important to us.

We purchase ingredients from local organic farmers and Fair Trade Certified suppliers whenever possible.

As a small local business, we strive to support our community. We hire staff from the immediate neighbourhood where our facility is located, including new-comers and vulnerable community members.

BIO RAW enforces an inclusive community workplace that supports our staff with sensitivity training.

In 2019, BIO RAW was awarded “Employer of the Year” by YMCA Employment Services.

settings.text:

settings.title: BENEFITS
settings.text_1: All of our plant-based meals have been thoughtfully curated by a nutritionist with the perfect balance of nutrients to fuel your day. We use superior Certified Organic ingredients, with zero fillers or empty calories.
settings.text_2: Each week we deliver your plant-based meals right to your home or office. Everything is pre-portioned in individual containers for easy grab-and-go meals perfect for wherever life takes you.
settings.text_3: All of our meals are made in our own private kitchen facility. Food safety and allergen control are our top priorities. Our facility is gluten-free, nut-free, dairy-free, and strictly plant-based.
settings.text_4: We are committed to minimizing our impact on the Earth’s resources through waste diversion, energy conservation, supporting local suppliers by choosing organic ingredients, and avoiding the use of toxic chemicals.
settings.text_5: Skip the meal prep and take back your free time with fewer trips to the store. No cooking, no cleaning - just eating! We also work closely with our trusted suppliers to source fresh, high-quality organic ingredients at an affordable price.
settings.text_6: All of our meals are made fresh to order and are ready-to-eat. You can enjoy them as is, or you can quickly stir-fry them up if you prefer a warm meal. Let us prepare your meals so that you can focus on the things that matter most to you!

settings.title: Organic, Plant-Based Meals Made Easy!
settings.text_1: Order what you want, when you want it. Choose between a one time order or a weekly subscription delivery. Subscription orders can be skipped or cancelled at anytime.
settings.text_2: We know that you're busy and we've got you covered with delivery right to your door! Contact us for a custom order or catering package, perfect for office team lunches and at home entertaining!
settings.text_3: Find our meals at stores across Ontario. We're here for you when life gets busy and you want to pick up a healthy meal in a pinch. Use our Store Locator to find a retailer near you!

settings.title: MEALS FOR EVERYONE
settings.text:
At BIO RAW we take food seriously, and work hard to create a synergy between nutrition and great taste. 

That's why we exclusively use Certified Organic, Non-GMO ingredients in all of our meals.

Our ready-to-eat, plant-based meal plans are perfect for ANY occasion.

Whether you need lunches on the go for work, dinners for those busy days, healthy meals for work office meetings or a vegan dinner night for the whole family... we got you covered!

settings.heading: FAQ
settings.title_1: How do I get BIO RAW?
settings.text_1:
1. Pick which salad option is best for you? Do you want 5, 10 or 20 salads delivered each week? And how many weeks would you like in your plan? (Remember, the longer the plan the cheaper the salads become!)
2. Selection which salads you want us to deliver.
3. Fill out your personal and delivery information.

And just like that you are on your way to getting a belly full of goodness! Click here to place your order now
settings.title_2: What is the shelf life of your meals?
settings.text_2: Everything is made fresh to order to ensure the healthiest, tastiest and best nourishment for you! The Caesar, The Balance, The Shred, The Ninja and The Chop have a 7 day shelf life with our two quinoa bowls, The Build and The Fiesta having a 5 day shelf life.
settings.text_3:
We have a number of options for delivery to make getting BIO RAW salads as easy as possible!

There are 3 easy steps to follow:

1. Pick which salad option is best for you? Do you want 5, 10 or 20 salads delivered each week? And how many weeks would you like in your plan? (Remember, the longer the plan the cheaper the salads become!)
2. Select which salads you want us to deliver.
3. Fill out your personal and delivery information.

And just like that you are on your way to getting a belly full of goodness! Click here to place your order now!
settings.title_4: Can I space out my package?
settings.text_4: Our subscription packages are designed to be delivered once a week each week for the length of the package. One pause is allowed in each package. We understand life can get busy and things can come up last minute, if there are any exceptions that need to be made please contact info@bioraw.ca to let us know and we can see what we can do. Since all our salads are made fresh to order we ask that all requests of this nature are done at least 48 hours before the next scheduled delivery.
settings.text_5: Sadly no! Right now, we’re only available in The Greater Toronto Area and surrounding areas. Always check back, or follow us on social to keep up with the latest zones and announcements!
settings.title_6: What if I am unhappy with the salads I chose in my package?
settings.text_6: We want all our customers to be happy and excited about getting their BIO RAW deliveries. You can make changes to your order up to 48 hours before your next scheduled delivery and MUST be done by emailing info@bioraw.ca. Because all our salads are made fresh to order we need the time to make the changes to your order to make sure you are happy with the salads you are feeding yourself!
settings.title_7: If I want to buy the products in store can I?
settings.text_7: Of course! We are proudly available in over 100 stores in the GTA. Click here to find the store nearest you!

settings.text: Whether you’re scheduling an office meeting, private function or entertaining friends and family, good food is at the heart of every great event. Let BIO RAW catering take the stress & guesswork out of meal planning so you can focus on the important things.

settings.title: LUNCH & LEARN
settings.text: How you fuel your body directly affects your performance, focus, mood and energy. Whether you’re providing your team with essential nutrients to help them feel their best or bringing them together to inspire clean eating, our healthy meals are a great way to boost team morale.

settings.title: What is the shelf life of your meals?
settings.text: Everything is made fresh to order to ensure the healthiest, tastiest and best nourishment for you! THE CAESAR, THE BALANCE, THE SHRED, THE NINJA , and THE CHOP have a 7-day shelf life. Our two quinoa-based bowls, THE BUILT and THE FIESTA, have a 5-day shelf life.

settings.title: Why is there white and black stuff on my tempeh? Is this normal?
settings.text: Tempeh is a fermented food that is created by fermenting soybeans. Good mold is allowed to grow and reproduce during the fermentation process. The tempeh that we use is pasteurized and completely edible and safe to eat! Tempeh is filled with nourishing gut probiotics, and is a highly digestible plant-based protein. as possible for your customers.

settings.title: The dressings are a little hard?
settings.text: Our dressings are made from a base of raw apple cider vinegar and raw cold-pressed extra virgin olive oil. Oil naturally hardens when refrigerated, but will soften right up when left at room temperature for a short time! Before you’re ready to enjoy your meal, take your dressing out of the refrigerator and allow it to sit at room temperature for 5-10 minutes.

settings.title: Is your food nut free?!
settings.text: We are proud to be operating a 100% nut-free kitchen facility. BIO RAW believes in providing food for everyone and we have made sure that our facility complies with all guidelines and have strict allergen protocols in place to ensure that we follow all the guidelines and requirements for allergens.

settings.title: Are your meals gluten free?
settings.text: All the ingredients that we use are gluten-free verified by our suppliers. Our meals are produced in a completely gluten-free kitchen facility. We actively test our meals to ensure that they are safe for even the most sensitive gluten allergies.

settings.title: Are the meals dairy free?
settings.text: As a vegan brand we do not allow dairy and other animal products into our kitchen facility. BIO RAW meals are safe for all of our lactose sensitive friends!

settings.title: Are your meals soy-free?
settings.text: Our offerings include 6 soy-free meals and 1 meal, THE NINJA which contains soy (tempeh which is a fermented soy product). We understand that soy is a common allergen and food sensitivity so we work hard to ensure that there is no cross-contamination with any other ingredients or meals. We work closely with third-party agencies to ensure we go above and beyond all suggested protocols to avoid any cross-contamination.

settings.title: Are all your products vegan?
settings.text: YES! We proudly produce 100% vegan products and all of our meals are Certified Vegan.

settings.title: Are all of your meals organic?
settings.text: Yes, our meals are USDA Certified Organic. We are proud that 100% of our ingredients are certified organic by a third-party agency. We believe in nourishing our customers to the best of our abilities and to do this organic ingredients is a must!

settings.title: How healthy are your meals? Which one is the best? How do I know which meal will fit my needs?
settings.text: We understand that everyone has different tastes, goals and needs from their food. For a full list of all the salads and nutritional benefits please click here.

settings.title: Can I get everything that I need nutritionally from eating BIO RAW meals?
settings.text: All of our meals are carefully crafted by our in-house nutritionists, to provide you with exceptional nutritional value. While our meals are well balanced and nutritionist approved, we do suggest that you consult with your nutritionist or health-care specialist if you have any specific dietary concerns.

settings.title: How will I get my protein?
settings.text: Many plant-based foods offer a wonderful source of protein. Our meals are carefully crafted by our in-house nutritionists to ensure that they contain the right balance of tasty plant-based proteins to fuel you all day long. Our meals range from 8 to 18 grams of protein in each serving. While our meals are well balanced and nutritionist approved, we do suggest that you consult with your nutritionist or health-care specialist if you have any specific dietary concerns.

settings.title: I’m not vegan or vegetarian, can I still enjoy BIO RAW meals and feel like I’m not missing out?
settings.text: Of course! Adding more whole foods, plant-based options to your diet (like our delicious meals!) is always a good idea and a great way to shrink our environmental footprint too. Canada’s revised Food Guide emphasizes a high proportion of plant-based foods, and encourages Canadians to consume plenty of vegetables and fruits, whole grains, and protein foods. The guide also recommends choosing proteins that come from plants more often.

settings.title: Is this a good diet plan?
settings.text: We don’t believe in crash dieting or extreme programs. We are happy to provide nutrient-rich meals to compliment your efforts in achieving your goals in the healthiest way possible. We want to create lifelong partnerships with our customers to nourish them forever and always! While our meals are well balanced and nutritionist approved, we do suggest that you consult with your nutritionist or health-care specialist if you have any specific dietary concerns.

settings.title: How does delivery work?
settings.text:
We have a number of options for delivery to make having BIO RAW meals delivered as easy as possible!

1. CHOOSE YOUR PLAN
We make it easy to order weekly meals. Select a plan that best suits your lifestyle and needs. Our plans range from 5 - 20 meals delivered per week.

2. CUSTOMIZE
All of our meals are made fresh to order. Once you’ve selected a plan customize your order by choosing the meals that you want to receive. This is the perfect opportunity to select your favourite meals or try something new!

3. SCHEDULE DELIVERY
Choose a delivery date and time that works best for you. Delivery is always FREE to your home or office. We know that you’re busy and we’ve got you covered!

Click here to place your order now!

settings.title: Can I space out my package?
settings.text:
Each week, you will receive one delivery with your meals for the week. The delivery will be made on the same day every week for the length of your subscription. One pause is allowed for each package with 48 hours notice.

We understand that life can get busy and that things can come up last minute. Please let us know if you need any accommodations by emailing us at info@bioraw.ca and we will see what we can do.

All of our meals are made fresh to order and so we ask that all requests of this nature are done at least 48 hours in advance of your scheduled delivery.

settings.title: Do I have to be present to accept my delivery?
settings.text:
In an effort to limit waste, we deliver your meals in a large compostable and recyclable brown paper bag. We recommend that someone is available to accept the delivery when it arrives so that you can get your meals right into the refrigerator to ensure freshness.

We offer a variety of delivery dates and times to best suit your schedule. Please click here for more details.

settings.title: Are you available across Canada?
settings.text:
Sadly no! At the moment you can find your meals at stores throughout Ontario. Click to view our delivery area and to search our store locator.

Always check back, or follow us on socials to keep up with announcements about new stores and expanded delivery areas.

settings.title: What if I am unhappy with the meals that I chose in my package?
settings.text: We want all of our customers to be happy and excited about getting their BIO RAW deliveries! You can make changes to your order up to 48 hours before your next scheduled delivery. Any changes MUST be done via email - info@bioraw.ca. All of our meals are made fresh to order, so we need time to make any changes.

settings.title: Can I cancel my order after placing it?
settings.text: If for whatever reason you would like to cancel your order with us please do so by contacting us by email - info@bioraw.ca We ask that all cancelations are done at least 48 hours before your scheduled delivery. All of our meals are made to order, so we request as much notice as possible so that we can avoid food waste. We are unable to make any changes after the 48 hour window.

settings.title: OUR CERTIFIED ORGANIC MENU
settings.text: All of our meals are made fresh to order. Once you’ve selected a plan, customize your order by choosing the meals that you want to receive. This is the perfect opportunity to select your weekly favourites or try something new!

settings.title: THE BUILT
settings.text: The perfect post-workout meal, boasting 18g of protein, and 11g of fiber per serving. This hearty bowl is loaded with quinoa, a mighty seed that contains the full range of essential amino acids that are essential for recovery. The addition of collard greens provides essential calcium and iron. THE BUILT is packed with zucchini noodles, kale, and pinto beans, which will keep you feeling satiated and energized. This meal is topped with a creamy, dairy-free ranch dressing.

settings.title: THE NINJA
settings.text:
This Asian-inspired, Keto-friendly meal is packed with nutrient-rich collard greens and cabbage. 

Bok choy provides a rich source of phytonutrients and beneficial antioxidants. The star of the show is marinated tempeh, a fermented, easy to digest, plant-based protein. THE NINJA is topped with a delicious ginger and garlic Japanese-inspired dressing.

*Please note: this is our only meal that contains soy.

settings.title: THE FIESTA
settings.text: The ultimate healthy burrito bowl! Fibre-rich quinoa and zucchini noodles form the base of this bowl. Kale, tomatoes, and peppers add colour, anti-inflammatory properties, and antioxidants. THE FIESTA would not be complete without black beans which provide potassium to help strengthen digestive function.  The Fiesta is topped with a delicious Italian-style dressing, loaded with flavourful herbs.

settings.title: THE CAESAR
settings.text: Our healthy Caesar salad is loaded with 17g of protein per serving. Nutrient and fiber-dense kale, romaine lettuce, and chickpeas form the base of this bowl. It’s topped with sunflower microgreens and our house-made coconut “bacon.” Hemp hearts add a complete protein which is rich in essential fatty acids and Omegas 3&6. THE CAESAR is paired with a creamy dairy-free Caesar dressing, for a healthy meal that you can feel good about!

settings.title: THE BALANCE
settings.text: This meal boasts 11g of protein per serving and is packed with immunity-boosting greens, and antioxidant-rich broccoli microgreens. THE BALANCE is Keto-friendly and topped with fresh basil, green onions, and sprouted sunflower and pumpkin seeds. Our flavourful, dairy-free poppy seed and onion dressing make for the perfect mix of sweet and savoury!

settings.title: THE CHOP
settings.text: We’ve elevated the traditional chopped salad with a full-spectrum of protein-rich greens, black beans, sprouted seeds, and hemp hearts. Boasting 14g of protein per serving, it’s the perfect post-workout meal. THE CHOP is topped with fresh dill and a creamy, dairy-free ranch dressing with no shortage of satisfying flavour!

settings.title: THE SHRED
settings.text: This spicy spiralized zucchini bowl is made with our long-time favourite dairy-free chipotle cheese style sauce that’s always a crowd-pleaser! THE SHRED is topped with our homemade dairy-free parmesan made with hemp hearts, raw pumpkin seeds, garlic powder, and nutritional yeast. This Keto-friendly meal is filled with kale, broccoli microgreens, and sprouted seeds to add a healthy crunch and boost in vitamins. With 17 g protein per serving, this meal is perfect for post-workout or any time of the day.

settings.heading: FAQ
settings.title_1: What is the shelf life of your meals?
settings.text_1: Everything is made fresh to order to ensure the healthiest, tastiest and best nourishment for you! The Caesar, The Balance, The Shred, The Ninja and The Chop have a 7 day shelf life with our two quinoa bowls, The Build and The Fiesta having a 5 day shelf life.
settings.title_2: How healthy are the salads? Which one is the best? How do I know which salads fit my needs?
settings.text_2: We understand that everyone has different tastes, goals and needs from their food. For a full list of all the salads and their nutritional benefits and information please click here to find out more!
settings.title_3: Can I get all that I need from eating salads?
settings.text_3: All our meals have been specially curated with a dietitian to ensure they are well balanced and provide everything you need to get through your busy days! (Or a great ready made meal for those lazier days ;))
settings.title_4: I’m not vegan or vegetarian, can I still enjoy the salads and feel like I’m not missing out?
settings.text_4: Of course! Though we are vegan we respect all ways of life. Adding more plant based options to your diet is a great substitute for meat while still getting all the nutrition and body nourishing goodness you need. Plus it is a great way to save the planet and feel good while eating great food!
settings.title_5: Is this a good diet plan?
settings.text_5: We don’t believe in crash dieting or any other extreme program. As most experts will tell you being healthy and working towards weight loss goals is best done with a healthy balance diet (diet meaning everything you eat for your whole life not the way the words is often used to describe crash dieting) paired with exercise. We are happy to provide nutrition rich meals to work with you to achieve your goals in the healthiest way possible, but we want to create lifelong partnerships with our customers to nourish them forever and always!

settings.title: CATERING
settings.text:
Whether you’re scheduling an office meeting, private function or entertaining friends and family, good food is at the heart of every great event. Let BIO RAW catering take the stress & guesswork out of meal planning so you can focus on the important things.

We focus on fresh, healthy, organic ingredients that allows the local produce to shine and really impress your guests, staff, and clients. Our talented catering team is more than happy to accommodate all dietary needs and our packaging is environmentally friendly.

Whatever your healthy catering needs, we’ve got you covered.

Call us at 647-449-6736 or fill out the form below for a custom quote based on your needs!

settings.title: WE CARE ABOUT ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION
settings.subheading: We're committed to leading the industry in minimizing our impact on the Earth and its resources. We take every step to make sure we are producing great products in the most environmentally conscious ways possible.

settings.title: PLANT-BASED FOR  THE PLANET
settings.text_1: Animal agriculture is the leading cause of species extinction, ocean dead zones, water pollution, and habitat destruction.
settings.text_2: It takes the equivalent of 50 bathtubs of water to produce just one steak.
settings.text_3: Choosing plant-based options is the most significant thing that you can do to reduce your footprint.

settings.title: WASTE DIVERSION
settings.text: We have partnered with a local waste collection agency that specializes in organics and recycling programs. They ensure that any waste produced in the production of our meals is responsibly diverted from landfills and transformed into resources whenever possible - like feeding our organic food scraps to animals! We’re able to track our results and C02 diversion equivalents for our facility to meet our program goals.

settings.title: ENERGY CONSERVATION
settings.text: We are committed to minimizing the energy used in our kitchen facility which is powered by 100% green electricity. We also use ENERGY STAR certified products, using programmable timers, taking advantage of natural light, and programmable thermostats. Preserving our resources is a value that resonates with our staff who have participated in conservation training, and actively participate in ensuring that our standards are met. We use an accredited program to offset the greenhouse gas emissions generated by our activities.

settings.title: SUPER CLEAN
settings.text: We never use toxic chemicals in our facility or in ANY of our products. We proudly use cleaner and healthier alternatives to conventional products. We execute large scale marketing initiatives to better educate our customers on how to properly dispose of packaging and encourage the diversion of waste from landfills.

settings.title: EARTH-FRIENDLY PACKAGING
settings.text:
Our packaging is made from renewable materials such as corn, not petroleum. This means that it will decompose faster than conventional plastic packaging.

We ensure that we only use packaging which meets ASTM D6400 compostable standards and that is ECOLOGO certified. Along with this, we will only purchase FSC certified, unbleached paper, which is used for our customers invoices and paper towels for our facility.

Most municipalities in Ontario are set up to compost our packaging. If you’re in Toronto, place our packaging in the garbage (not the compost) as the city cannot compost it at this time. Be sure to check with your local municipality on how to properly dispose of our meal containers in your area. If you are recycling the packaging please wash first to ensure proper recycling.

settings.title: HEALTH IN NUMBERS
settings.text:
We’d like to plant a little seed: You don’t have to be hardcore vegan to get big benefits from eating more plants. And you don't have to go cold-turkey, either. (Pun intended!) Eating more plants can be as simple as having 1 meatless day a week or substituting one of your 3 meals each day with a plant-based meal. Small changes like this add up and make a big difference over time.

When you include more plant-based foods into your diet, you increase your quality of life!
settings.feature_text_content-1: decreased chance of high blood pressure*

settings.title: BIORAW MEALS NEVER CONTAIN
settings.text:
× Gluten
× Meat products
× Dairy
× GMOs
× Pesticides
× Insecticides
× Sweeteners
× Preservatives
× Hydrogenated fats
× Colours, natural flavours

settings.title: OUR 8 PILLARS OF NUTRITION
settings.text: At BIO RAW we care about your health and believe food is medicine. In other words, you are what you eat! That's why we work hard to provide you a plant based meal delivery program that is based on a whole-food, plant-rich diet that includes fresh, nutrient-dense, and delicious ingredients. Our nutritional pillars form the basis of each and every meal that comes to your door.

settings.title: 1. ALWAYS ORGANIC
settings.text:
We’re 100%, USDA Organic Certified, because we believe customers deserve the highest quality food free of pesticides, insecticides, synthetic fertilizers, irradiation, GMOs and conventional residues that come with non-organic meals. Not only that but we are trying to protect the environment. Organic farming practices help maintain or enhance soil and water quality; conserving wetlands, woodlands, and wildlife. Conventional ingredients that are grown with pesticides harm the planet, ruin the biodiversity of the land, injure the animals in and around conventional farms, pollute our water and it’s often migrant workers that are the ones spraying the pesticides.

It seems like everyone today is suffering from some sort of auto immune deficiency, or some kind of gastrointestinal problem. More and more information is becoming apparent that all the pesticides and GMOs in our food systems are causing these issues and many more.

As a food manufacturer it is our duty to only use 100% certified organic ingredients and we urge our customers to VOTE WITH THEIR dollar and support exclusively organic ingredients and a food-chain free of comprise. Every time you make a purchase you're casting your vote and letting retailers know you want more local organic options available for purchase.

settings.title: 2. NUTRIENT DENSE
settings.text:
A fundamental pillar, we only use real whole food ingredients that are first and foremost bioavailable*, easy-to-digest, and chock full of essential amino acids, vitamins, minerals and the essential omegas! We want you to know that we’ve GOT you when it comes to nourishment with our meals.

*bioavailable refers to how easy it is for your body to absorb the nutrients. The more bioavailable and “activated” the more benefit you will have from that food.

settings.title: 3. GLUTEN FREE
settings.text: We have a gluten-free facility and will never compromise on that. As gluten contributes to inflammation (in the gut and beyond) and does more harm than good, we strive to always be gluten free – supporting the digestive tract of every valued customer. Let customers know we have our own private facility here in Toronto that is COMPLETELY allergen-free. We are in the process of obtaining our certified gluten-free certification.

settings.title: 4. PLANT-BASED PROTEIN
settings.text: We believe in vegan food offerings, and will never produce any products that contain animal by-products. We’re dedicated to changing the retail shelves and removing animal cruelty from the food chain. We offer a wide variety of plant-based proteins in all of our meals, from sprouted seeds, to beans and legumes, to tempeh, to protein rich vegetables like broccoli microgreens!

settings.title: 5. GREENS
settings.text:
Greens are the least consumed food in the standard North American diet, and the most essential for inner and outer health. Greens are one of the most potent and powerful foods on the planet.

Low in calories, yet high in fiber, vitamins, and phytonutrients, greens are incredible for your health in more ways than you would even suspect. It helps with staying young, lowering cholesterol, preserve's vision health, gut health, supports bone health, improves inflamattory response, helps balance blood sugar, support optimal brian function, tames toxins, boost digestive enzymes, supports your immune system and the list goes on!

As you can see, you want to be getting those greens!

settings.title: 6. EAT THE RAINBOW, & LOTS OF IT
settings.text: Each colour of every vegetable and fruit you eat contains its own unique antioxidant quality, so we pack all of our meals with as many colourful veggies as possible. This way, we ensure you get as many of antioxidants as possible, from all the colours!

settings.title: 7. ONLY THE GOOD FAT
settings.text: We never compromise on the quality of the fats we use, because we don’t compromise on you. Unlike most other companies, we only use the good stuff (no canola here): olive oil, hempseeds and sprouted seeds to provide you with the anti-inflammatory, hormone building fats that allow you to thrive.

settings.title: 8. THOUGHTS COUNT AS NUTRITION TOO
settings.text: The narratives we tell ourselves every day count as nourishment, in our humble opinion. A healthy diet is amazing, but a healthy positive mindset matters just as much. Feed your stomach the right food and feed your mind as much self-loving thoughts as you can. That way you’ve got a winning combination, culminating in radiant health!

settings.title: What is the shelf life of your meals?
settings.text: Everything is made fresh to order to ensure the healthiest, tastiest and best nourishment for you! THE CAESAR, THE BALANCE, THE SHRED, THE NINJA , and THE CHOP have a 7-day shelf life. Our two quinoa-based bowls, THE BUILT and THE FIESTA, have a 5-day shelf life.

settings.title: How healthy are your meals? Which one is the best? How do I know which meal will fit my needs?
settings.text: We understand that everyone has different tastes, goals and needs from their food. For a full list of all the salads and nutritional benefits please click here.

settings.title: Can I get everything that I need nutritionally from eating BIO RAW meals?
settings.text: All of our meals are carefully crafted by our in-house nutritionists, to provide you with exceptional nutritional value. While our meals are well balanced and nutritionist approved, we do suggest that you consult with your nutritionist or health-care specialist if you have any specific dietary concerns.

settings.title: I’m not vegan or vegetarian, can I still enjoy BIO RAW meals and feel like I’m not missing out?
settings.text: Of course! Adding more whole foods, plant-based options to your diet (like our delicious meals!) is always a good idea and a great way to shrink our environmental footprint too. Canada’s revised Food Guide emphasizes a high proportion of plant-based foods, and encourages Canadians to consume plenty of vegetables and fruits, whole grains, and protein foods. The guide also recommends choosing proteins that come from plants more often.

settings.title: Is this a good diet plan?
settings.text: We don’t believe in crash dieting or extreme programs. We are happy to provide nutrient-rich meals to compliment your efforts in achieving your goals in the healthiest way possible. We want to create lifelong partnerships with our customers to nourish them forever and always! While our meals are well balanced and nutritionist approved, we do suggest that you consult with your nutritionist or health-care specialist if you have any specific dietary concerns.
